trans-unit.source: Enumerates values for the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Volume" name="Volume" href=""></xref> property of a <xref uid="langword_csharp_Prosody" name="Prosody" href=""></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Enumera os valores para o <xref uid="langword_csharp_Volume" name="Volume" href=""> </xref> propriedade de um <xref uid="langword_csharp_Prosody" name="Prosody" href=""> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Typically synthetic speech engine output volume as defined by the members of ProsodyVolume correspond to a percent of the maximum possible output loudness.
trans-unit.target: Geralmente volume de saída de mecanismo de fala sintéticos conforme definido pelos membros de ProsodyVolume correspondem a uma porcentagem de intensidade o máximo possível de saída.

trans-unit.source: For instance Loud corresponds to approximately 80% of the maximum volume.
trans-unit.target: Para a instância em alta corresponde a aproximadamente 80% do volume máximo.

trans-unit.source: However, any specific synthetic speech engine implementations may choose how to render audio output for a given value of ProsodyVolume.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, as implementações de mecanismo de fala sintético específico podem escolher como renderizar a saída de áudio para um determinado valor de ProsodyVolume.

trans-unit.source: The current base volume setting for a custom synthetic speech engine is obtained as a ProsodyVolume value through the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.Volume%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite> site supplied to that engine.
trans-unit.target: A configuração atual de volume de base para um mecanismo de fala sintético personalizado é obtido como um valor de ProsodyVolume por meio de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.Volume%2A>propriedade no <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite>site fornecido para esse mecanismo.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.Volume%2A>

trans-unit.source: Fine tuning and modulation of output volume is managed on the basis of particular <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> objects, using members of ProsodyVolume to set the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody.Volume%2A> property on instances of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody> used in creating or modifying the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> object for the instance of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.
trans-unit.target: Ajuste e modulação de volume de saída é gerenciado com base em determinados <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>objetos, usando membros de ProsodyVolume para definir a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody.Volume%2A>propriedade em instâncias de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody>usado na criação ou modificação do <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>objeto para a instância de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody.Volume%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>

trans-unit.source: Current default volume value, same as the value returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.Volume*> property on the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite"></xref> site supplied to that engine.
trans-unit.target: Valor atual de volume padrão, mesmo que o valor retornado pelo <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.Volume*>propriedade o <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite"> </xref> site fornecido para esse mecanismo.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.Volume*>
